title: Account Management
subtitle: Manage your PanPlans account and data

deletion.title: Delete Your Account
deletion.description: If you wish to delete your PanPlans account, you can do so through the app or by contacting us.

inApp.title: Delete via App
steps: Go to Settings (tap the gear icon)
Confirm your decision by entering your password
Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted

contact.title: Delete via Email
contact.description: Alternatively, you can request account deletion by emailing us:
contact.note: Please include the email address associated with your account. We will process your request within 30 days.

deletion.warning: Warning: Account deletion is permanent and cannot be undone. All your meal plans, pantry data, recipes, and settings will be permanently deleted.

export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: You have the right to receive a copy of your personal data. To request a data export:
steps: Go to Settings > Account > Export Data
Select the data you want to export

contact.description: You can also request a data export by emailing:

export.format: Your data will be provided in a portable format (JSON/CSV) within 30 days of your request.
